enum Reason

## [Topics](/documentation/realitykit/anchorstateevents/didfailtoanchor/reason-swift.enum#topics)

### [Enumeration Cases](/documentation/realitykit/anchorstateevents/didfailtoanchor/reason-swift.enum#Enumeration-Cases)

[`case addAnchorFailed`](/documentation/realitykit/anchorstateevents/didfailtoanchor/reason-swift.enum/addanchorfailed)anchor fails to be added, due to anchor tracking provider error[`case anchorNotSupported`](/documentation/realitykit/anchorstateevents/didfailtoanchor/reason-swift.enum/anchornotsupported)anchor fails because the anchor type is not supported by the hardware configuration[`case maximumLimitReached`](/documentation/realitykit/anchorstateevents/didfailtoanchor/reason-swift.enum/maximumlimitreached)anchor fails to be added, due to anchor tracking provider reaching its maximum anchor limit[`case unspecified`](/documentation/realitykit/anchorstateevents/didfailtoanchor/reason-swift.enum/unspecified)anchor fails with no specified reason## [Relationships](/documentation/realitykit/anchorstateevents/didfailtoanchor/reason-swift.enum#relationships)
